cells.data:
AttrPlugin 

Animate any numeric attribute of DOM element

CSSPlugin

  • Basic CSS properties: width, height, margin, padding, top, left ...
  • Transforms: rotation, scaleX, scaleY, skewX, skewY, x, y, rotationX, rotation Y...
  • Other CSS Properties: opacity, box-shadow, transform-origin...
  • Filters: blur(), grayscale(), sepia(), contrast(), brightness(), hue-rotate()...
